string.value: #b#@1012003:##k, who has been keeping an eye on #r#t4001341:##k, says he needs some help. Let's talk to him.
He says to go over to #b#@1092012:##k in #b#m120000200##k and investigate #r#t4001341:##k.
#b#@1092012:##k in #b#m120000200##k says he's finished analyzing the clues. Let's talk to him.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 2000 Able to proceed to 'Investigation in Progress' as next quest.

I carefully inspected the Iron Fragment, and I can assure you that this isn't from Perion. I'm sorry for overreacting... I was too quick to judge.\n\nI need to look into a few more things. Will you continue to help me?

You're very generous. I know that this Iron Fragment didn't come from Perion, but I have no other way to find more information about it. I need an expert's help.\n\nI heard that #b#p1092012##k in #b#m120000200##k has expertise in this field. Could you rush over there?
Ha! Of course, people from Perion are...I'm kidding. Come back and see me if you change your mind.
Hello, I'm #b#p1092012##k. You have something you want me to look at?
Now, let's see here. It sure looks ordinary, but I feel a strange force emanating from it.\n\nWhy don't you look around #bThe Nautilus#k and rest while I look into it a little more?
